website_summaries.verdict: This model boasts an array of great features in a powerful, spacious unit that can handle the cooking needs of large families.
pros: At 2.0 cubic feet, this interior is big enough to accommodate larger dishes
The 1,200 watts on this unit cooks food thoroughly and evenly
Features include an impressive 13 programmable one-touch setting and built-in sensor cooking controls
Automatically detects if the oven needs to adjust its power level or cook time
cons: The unit is quite loud when in use, which some users might find annoying

customer_reviews.title: Powerful microwave that heats uniformly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great counter top microwave, because of the size we place it on a microwave cart. It heats food uniformly. Comes with many pre programmed functions. The best option I found is it can be operated on silent mode. You can switch off the beeps completely. This is a vital part of my kitchen. Value for money equipment
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...great size...sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this microwave. I love that it has a large glass tray inside that revolves while microwaving and that it can be removed and easily be cleaned. Also, love that it can hold large casseroles. I am happy with its sleek, contemporary design as it matches my other GE appliances.
customer_reviews.author: UJS

customer_reviews.title: Problem with door.
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a problem with the door communicating with function buttons. I read the reviews before I purchased but gave the company the benefit of the doubt thinking problem would have been corrected. The issue is still a problem. Sad part is I really love the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Perdue

customer_reviews.title: best microwave ever
customer_reviews.text: This my third GE Microwave which I replaced due to a kitchen upgrade. Wouldn't buy any other brand! It has all the features you could want and it is large enough to fit most anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: GE Countertop Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy. Thought it would die very soon after I bought it. Bottoms on touchpad are VERY had to push. Hate the location of the start button. It should be a larger button on the bottom, like the LG. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitylove2

customer_reviews.title: Not that happy, not that great
customer_reviews.text: I was actually expecting this microwave to be as good as the one I bought 10 years ago. When the door shuts it sounds like tin. I still have the other one up, so compared 30 seconds on high with one cup of water in using identical coffee cups. The NEW microwave, this one, which is supposed to be more powerful, came out tepid...luke warm at best. My OLD microwave (same model at 1150 instead of 1250) was hot. That just isn't right. I'm going to keep it for awhile and see if it perks up and starts heating properly. Otherwise, it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: C. FryTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Needed a specific size for recess and this worked well both in fit and function. Beware that if you put food in and do not start in a few minutes, you must reopen the dood to activate unit. Overall, unit works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: PIece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted less than 6 months. Doesn't heat up anything just makes a loud pop when first trying to heat something. According to google searches the "magnetron" (heating element) is not working. and cannot be reset or replaced. Our other GE 2.0 CF was still working when we replaced it after 14 years. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KHT

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit when it works but dies in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted around 8 months and stopped working. Based on other reviews here these units seem to only last around a year. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Office Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had an under the counter that died. This fit in the space and works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: terena freehling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: We really do like the microwave!! It is very easy to use and to understand!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarence F McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. It was faulty and rerun cost yet not recovered!
customer_reviews.author: Nishant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement and it fit into the pre-existing built-in kit.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was a perfect replacement for the 12 year old GE Profile Microwave. It fit perfectly into the preexisting builtin kit.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Schuneman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect replacing for my old GE and trim kit!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Replaced monarch microwave. Doesn’t have all features but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd R. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Solid B, but some reservatons.
customer_reviews.text: Meets general expectations of a microwave of it's size. It is also somewhat louder than I would expect and off gases VOC during operation to more than I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of this model of GE microwave. The only difference is, is that this one has a larger inside capacity. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Ge microwave
customer_reviews.text: It is very large for a microwave other than that its working great. I would not purchase another one because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Sipes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: way to big ,hassel to return never took it out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Terry,Barb ,.

customer_reviews.title: Disposable microwave, replace yearly when it dies.
customer_reviews.text: Died after 13 months. Everything seems to be working but it no longer cooks food. After a bit of research I found that this is a common problem with GE microwaves. I contacted GE and they said it was out of warranty. I left a negative review similar to this one on their site and they deleted it. They should rename their microwaves as "disposable" as they're dead after one year.
customer_reviews.author: Specter

customer_reviews.title: Great Canadian Company; GE lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this microwave for about 10 years. It has been used daily for the entire time by a lot of people. Only now, is it beginning to fail; it keeps running ( without heat) when the door is opened, but still works ! Really great machine ! Canadian made !
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra shea

customer_reviews.title: GE Microwaves are not worth the premium price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a GE Monogram microwave and had the touch panel fail multiple times. Service technicians made multiple (5+) unnecessary visits (one to diagnose, one to finally repair - even though it was obvious what the problem was after the first failure....) and the fix would only last a short time. I have 20 year old microwaves in my basement that still work and have never had a service call. This is my 2nd GE microwave to fail and they do NOT stand behind their name. Avoid GE microwaves at all cost - or you will pay plenty! (Case #18112-004828)
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Beck

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2.5 whole years.  I guess that's better than some.  Still, one star.
customer_reviews.text: My previous GE microwave lasted 33 years (I bought it when my daughter was born). This one lasted 2.5 years. It suddenly failed to heat. All the buttons work, no smoke or smell etc, it just won't heat. It's not the diode, HV capacitor, HV transformer, or magnetron filament, as far as I can tell. Might be the power relay, which means replacing the PC board, which isn't happening.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Having to replace mine so going with the exact thing. Old one died last night after working for only 11 YEARS. wHATS NOT TO LIKE ABOUT THAT! And YES, we used the heck out of it.
customer_reviews.author: John Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality product. They fail after the warranty expires. Don't buy Ge.
customer_reviews.author: Dill

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be a pretty good microwave at first, but after barely 1 year it was emitting strong burning odors - like burning rubber. Attempts to get a human at GE for possible support proved unsuccessful and very frustrating. More junk for the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Historicus

customer_reviews.title: Replaces JEB1860DM1
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for a 9.5 year old JEB1860DM1WW that was built-in and had a full trim kit. This model was *absolutely* identical, down to the point that even the old trim kit venting components bolted to this microwave. Though in order to get it in WW I had to order direct from Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts one year!!!! GE will not replace or repair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after one year and 2 days just passed the warranty date GE said they are sorry. That's all Expensive microwave to only last one year Won't be buying GE EVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Amy Adams

customer_reviews.title: so not knowing how old it was and since I liked the way it looked with my other appliances I ...
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was already in the house that I purchased, it went out shortly after moving in, so not knowing how old it was and since I liked the way it looked with my other appliances I bought another one. Second one did not last 2 years, will not make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just died
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was very good but did not last 2 years. We seldom used it and thought it would have lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died After 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: Never buying GE appliances again. Died while popping popcorn after just over a year. STEER CLEAR OF GE. Please, I beg you. No power. Zip.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Means

customer_reviews.title: Good Oven-Hefty Price!
customer_reviews.text: So that we are on a fair playing field Check the price of this at Home Depot. You will find a marked difference.
customer_reviews.author: E. Feiner

customer_reviews.title: jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: Just got this model, took it home, plugged it in, turned it on and the sheet metal covering vibrates very noisily. Repairman is on the way but I don't see much he can do to fix it. Will probably wind up returning it. It appears to be very cheaply made. Too bad GE can't find an American manufacturer. Just more cheap Chinese crap I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

product_meta.title: GE JES2051SNSS Countertop Microwave, 2.0, stainless steel
product_meta.description: GE JES2051SNSS 2. 0 Cu. Ft. Stainless Steel Countertop Microwave.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars63 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
